reviewText: This is worth the money, especially if you don't know much about synths. I know enough to do midi with my DAR, but I'm primarily a guitarist. I started with Korg and sold it and went through several others before buying this Roland Fantom about 15 years ago. I've primarily used it as a piano and for some of the orchestral tones. This video taught me how to actually use it for all of the various amazing things you can do with this instrument. It's the manual that should've come with the thing to begin with.
